ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Yes I totally would recommend this course because it offers an insight on how images of the other are constructed. The knowledge acquired in this course offers an opportunity to review the image of Muslim and Islam--including social and personal perceptions-- and critically assess the discourse behind political positions regarding Islam. Very useful to analyze the construction of the "other" and it is applicable to many other social construction regarding other religions.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: A lot. It has been eye opening and very inspiring.
